The _Groove Template_ file is a combination of HTML code and groovy code blocks. The usage of eXo IDE gives the possibility to create and edit those files in editors.

h1. Create and Edit Groovy Template

To create a new groovy template, do as follows:
* *Step 1:* Go to *New > Groovy Template* on the _Toolbar_; or select *File > New > Groovy Template* on the top menu. The editor will open a new empty file.
* *Step 2:* Add content and the code will be highlighted. 
* *Step 3:* Save the file selecting *File > Save As* on  the top menu or clicking the *Save As* icon on the _Toolbar_. With groovy template file _Outline Panel_ and autocomplete, but only in HTML tags by now, can be used.

*Illustration 30. Operations with groovy templates*

h1. View properties

To view properties of the _Groovy Template_, click the *Show Properties* button on the right corner of the _Toolbar_.

h1. Preview Groovy Template

To preview Groovy Template you should do as follows:
* *Step 1:* Open saved earlier Groovy Template file
* *Step 2:* Click the *Show Preview* button on the _Toolbar_; or go to *Run->Show Preview* on top menu.
   Groovy Template will be opened in the _Gadget Container_ of _Preview Tab_, as it is figured out at the illustration *"Groovy templates preview"* below:
